bit_field.name: FW_DRV_RESYN_THR
bit_field.description: Minimum Speed threshold to resynchronize to close loop (% of MAX_SPEED)

settings.description: All three high side FETs turned ON
All three low side FETs turned ON
Brake time is used to come out of Brake state
Brake current threshold and Brake time is used to come out of Brake state

bit_field.name: STAT_DETECT_THR
bit_field.description: BEMF threshold to detect if motor is stationary

bit_field.name: REV_DRV_HANDOFF_THR
bit_field.description: Speed threshold used to transition to open loop during reverse deceleration (% of MAX_SPEED)

bit_field.name: REV_DRV_OPEN_LOOP_CURRENT
bit_field.description: Open loop current limit during speed reversal (A)

bit_field.name: REV_DRV_OPEN_LOOP_ACCEL_A1
bit_field.description: Open loop acceleration coefficient A1 during reverse drive

bit_field.name: REV_DRV_OPEN_LOOP_ACCEL_A2
bit_field.description: Open loop acceleration coefficient A2 during reverse drive

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_BRAKE_CURRENT_LIMIT
bit_field.description: Bus current limit during active braking (A)

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_BRAKE_KP
bit_field.description: 10-bit value for active braking loop Kp. Kp = ACTIVE_BRAKE_KP / 2^7

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_BRAKE_KI
bit_field.description: 10-bit value for active braking loop Ki. Ki = ACTIVE_BRAKE_KI / 2^9

bit_field.name: ALIGN_SLOW_RAMP_RATE
bit_field.description: Align, slow first cycle and open loop current ramp rate

bit_field.name: ALIGN_OR_SLOW_CURRENT_ILIMIT
bit_field.description: Align or slow first cycle current limit (A)

bit_field.name: IPD_REPEAT
bit_field.description: Number of times IPD is executed

settings.description: Open loop current limit defined by ILIMIT
Open loop current limit defined by OL_ILIMIT

bit_field.name: IQ_RAMP_EN
bit_field.description: Iq ramp down after transition to close loop enable

bit_field.name: REV_DRV_CONFIG
bit_field.description: Chooses between forward and reverse drive setting for reverse drive

settings.description: Open loop current, A1, A2 based on reverse drive
Open loop current, A1, A2 based on forward drive

bit_field.name: OPN_CL_HANDOFF_THR
bit_field.description: Open to Close loop Handoff Threshold (% of MAX_SPEED)

bit_field.name: SLOW_FIRST_CYC_FREQ
bit_field.description: Frequency of first cycle in close loop start-up (% of MAX_SPEED)

bit_field.name: FIRST_CYCLE_FREQ_SEL
bit_field.description: First cycle frequency in open loop for align, double align and IPD start-up options

bit_field.name: THETA_ERROR_RAMP_RATE
bit_field.description: Ramp rate for reducing difference between estimated theta and open loop theta (deg/ms)

settings.description: Closed loop deceleration defined by CL_ACC
Closed loop deceleration defined by CL_DEC

bit_field.name: CL_DEC
bit_field.description: Closed loop deceleration.  This register is used only if AVS is disabled and CL_DEC_CONFIG is set to '0'

settings.description: Output FG in open loop and closed loop
Output FG in only closed loop
Output FG in open loop for the first try.
FG active as long as motor is driven
FG active till BEMF drops below BEMF threshold defined by FG_BEMF_THR

bit_field.name: LOW_SPEED_RECIRC_BRAKE_EN
bit_field.description: Stop mode applied when stop mode is recirculation brake and motor running in align or open loop

bit_field.name: ACT_SPIN_THR
bit_field.description: Speed threshold for active spin down (% of MAX_SPEED)

bit_field.name: BRAKE_SPEED_THRESHOLD
bit_field.description: Speed threshold for BRAKE pin and Motor stop options (Low side Braking or High Side Braking or Align Braking)  (% of MAX_SPEED)

bit_field.name: MOTOR_RES
bit_field.description: 8-bit values for motor phase resistance   See table x for values of phase resistance

bit_field.name: MOTOR_IND
bit_field.description: 8-bit values for motor phase inductance   See table x for values of phase inductance

bit_field.name: MOTOR_BEMF_CONST
bit_field.description: 8-bit values for motor BEMF Constant   See table x for values of BEMF constant

bit_field.name: CURR_LOOP_KP
bit_field.description: 10-bit value for current Iq and Id loop Kp. Kp = 8LSB of CURR_LOOP_KP / 10^2MSB of CURR_LOOP_KP. Please make 0 for auto calculation of current Kp and Ki

bit_field.name: CURR_LOOP_KI
bit_field.description: 10-bit value for current Iq and Id loop Ki. Ki = 1000 * 8LSB of CURR_LOOP_KI / 10^2MSB of CURR_LOOP_KI. Please make 0 for auto calculation of current Kp and Ki

bit_field.name: SPD_LOOP_KP
bit_field.description: 3 MSB bits for speed loop Kp. Kp = 0.01 * 8LSB of SPD_LOOP_KP / 10^2MSB of SPD_LOOP_KP

bit_field.name: SPD_LOOP_KP
bit_field.description: 7 LSB bits for speed loop Kp. Kp = 0.01 * 8LSB of SPD_LOOP_KP / 10^2MSB of SPD_LOOP_KP

bit_field.name: SPD_LOOP_KI
bit_field.description: 10 bit value for speed loop Ki. Ki = 0.1 * 8LSB of SPD_LOOP_KI / 10^2MSB of SPD_LOOP_KI

bit_field.name: MAX_SPEED
bit_field.description: 14-bit value for setting maximum value of Speed in electrical Hz   Maximum motor electrical speed (Hz): {MOTOR_SPEED/6}   For example: if MOTOR_SPEED is 0x2710, then maximum motor speed (Hz) = 10000(0x2710)/6 = 1666 Hz

bit_field.name: HW_LOCK_ILIMIT
bit_field.description: Comparator based lock detection current limit (A)

bit_field.name: LOCK_ILIMIT
bit_field.description: ADC based lock detection current threshold (A)

settings.description: Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is tristated
Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in high side brake mode (All high side FETs are turned ON)
Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in low side brake mode (All low side FETs are turned ON)

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is tristated; nFault active

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in recirculation mode; nFault active
Fault automatically cleared for AUTO_RETRY_TIMES  after LCK_RETRY time; Gate driver is in high side brake mode (All high side FETs are turned ON); nFault active

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in low side brake mode (All low side FETs are turned ON); nFault active
Ilimit lock detection current limit is in report only but no action is taken; nFault active

bit_field.name: LOCK_ILIMIT_DEG
bit_field.description: Lock Detection current limit deglitch time

settings.description: Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is tristated
Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in high side brake mode (All high side FETs are turned ON)
Motor lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in low side brake mode (All low side FETs are turned ON)

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is tristated; nFault active

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in recirculation mode; nFault active
Fault automatically cleared for AUTO_RETRY_TIMES  after LCK_RETRY time; Gate driver is in high side brake mode (All high side FETs are turned ON); nFault active

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in low side brake mode (All low side FETs are turned ON); nFault active
Motor lock detection current limit is in report only but no action is taken; nFault active

bit_field.name: SATURATION_FLAGS_EN
bit_field.description: Enables indication of current loop and speed loop saturation

bit_field.name: ABNORMAL_BEMF_THR
bit_field.description: Abnormal BEMF lock threshold (% of expected BEMF)

Hardware Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in recirculation mode
Hardware Ilimit lock detection causes latched fault; nFAULT active; Gate driver is in high side brake mode (All high side FETs are turned ON)

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is tristated
Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in recirculation mode

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in high side brake mode (All high side FETs are turned ON)

Fault automatically cleared after LCK_RETRY time. Number of retries limited to AUTO_RETRY_TIMES. If number of retries exceed AUTO_RETRY_TIMES, fault is latched; Gate driver is in low side brake mode (All low side FETs are turned ON)
Hardware ILIMIT lock detection is in report only but no action is taken

bit_field.name: HW_LOCK_ILIMIT_DEG
bit_field.description: Hardware Lock Detection current limit deglitch time (Bit Number 11 is reserved

settings.description: Automatic clear if voltage in bounds
Automatic clear if voltage in bounds

bit_field.name: DUTY_ON1
bit_field.description: Duty_ON1 Configuration   Turn On Duty Cycle (%) = {(DUTY_ON1/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_OFF1
bit_field.description: Duty_OFF1 Configuration   Turn Off Duty Cycle (%) = {(DUTY_OFF1/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_CLAMP1
bit_field.description: Duty_CLAMP1 Configuration   Duty Cycle for clamping speed (%) = {(DUTY_CLAMP1/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_A
bit_field.description: 5 MSB bits for Duty Cycle A

bit_field.name: DUTY_A
bit_field.description: 3 LSB bits for Duty Cycle A Duty_A Configuration   Duty Cycle A (%) = {(DUTY_A/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_E
bit_field.description: 4 MSB bits for Duty Cycle E

bit_field.name: DUTY_E
bit_field.description: 4 LSB bits for Duty Cycle E Duty_E Configuration   Duty Cycle E (%) = {(DUTY_E/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_ON2
bit_field.description: Duty_ON2 Configuration   Turn On Duty Cycle (%) = {(DUTY_ON2/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_OFF2
bit_field.description: Duty_OFF2 Configuration   Turn Off Duty Cycle (%) = {(DUTY_OFF2/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_CLAMP2
bit_field.description: Duty_CLAMP2 Configuration   Duty Cycle for clamping speed (%) = {(DUTY_CLAMP1/255)*100}

bit_field.name: DUTY_HYST
bit_field.description: Duty hysteresis for speed reference mode

bit_field.name: SPEED_OFF1
bit_field.description: Turn off speed Configuration   Turn off speed (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_OFF1/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_CLAMP1
bit_field.description: Clamp Speed Configuration   Clamp Speed (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_CLAMP1/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_A
bit_field.description: Speed A configuration   SPEED A (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_A/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_B
bit_field.description: 1 LSB of SPEED_B configuration Speed B Configuration   SPEED B(% of MAX_SPEED)  = {(SPEED_B/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_C
bit_field.description: Speed C configuration   SPEED C (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_A/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_D
bit_field.description: Speed D configuration   SPEED D (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_D/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_E
bit_field.description: Speed E Configuration   SPEED E(% of MAX_SPEED)  = {(SPEED_E/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_OFF2
bit_field.description: Turn off speed Configuration   Turn off speed (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_OFF2/255)*100}

bit_field.name: SPEED_CLAMP2
bit_field.description: Clamp Speed Configuration   Clamp Speed (% of MAX_SPEED) = {(SPEED_CLAMP2/255)*100}

bit_field.name:
ACTIVE_BRAKE_SPEED
_DELTA_LIMIT_EXIT
bit_field.description: Difference between final speed and present speed below which active braking will be stopped

bit_field.name: SPEED_PIN_GLITCH_FILTER
bit_field.description: Glitch filter applied on speed pin input

bit_field.name: ISD_STOP_TIME
bit_field.description: Persistence time for declaring motor has stopped

bit_field.name: ISD_RUN_TIME
bit_field.description: Persistence time for declaring motor is running

bit_field.name: ISD_TIMEOUT
bit_field.description: Timeout in case ISD is unable to reliably detect speed or direction

bit_field.name: BRAKE_CURRENT_PERSIST
bit_field.description: Persistence time for current below threshold during low side brake

bit_field.name: MPET_IPD_FREQ
bit_field.description: Number of times IPD is executed for MPET

bit_field.name: MPET_OPEN_LOOP_SPEED_REF
bit_field.description: Open Loop Speed Reference for MPET (% of MAXIMUM_SPEED)

bit_field.name: MPET_OPEN_LOOP_SLEW_RATE
bit_field.description: Open Loop Slew Rate for MPET (Hz/s)

bit_field.name: REV_DRV_OPEN_LOOP_DEC
bit_field.description: % of open loop acceleration to be applied during open loop deceleration in reverse drive

bit_field.name: CL_SLOW_ACC
bit_field.description: Close loop acceleration when estimator is not yet fully aligned ( Hz / sec)

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_BRAKE_BUS_CURRENT_SLEW_RATE
bit_field.description: Bus Current slew rate during active braking (A/s)

bit_field.name: MPET_IPD_SELECT
bit_field.description: Selection between MPET_IPD_CURRENT_LIMIT for IPD current limit, MPET_IPD_FREQ for IPD Repeat OR IPD_CURR_THR for IPD current limit, IPD_REPEAT for IPD Repeat

settings.description: Configured parameters for normal motor operation

bit_field.name: MPET_KE_MEAS_PARAMETER_SELECT
bit_field.description: Selection between MPET_OPEN_LOOP_SLEW_RATE for slew rate, MPET_OPEN_LOOP_CURR_REF for current reference, MPET_OPEN_LOOP_SPEED_REF for speed reference OR OL_ACC_A1, OL_ACC_A2 for slew rate, open loop current reference for current reference and open to closed loop speed threshold for speed reference

settings.description: Configured parameters for normal motor operation
FG continues and end state not defined, provided FG_CONFIG (defining FG during coasting)
Use last FG state when motor was driven
FG active till BEMF drops below BEMF threshold defined by FG_BEMF_THR if FG_CONFIG set to 1b
Use last commutation angle before entering align braking
Use ALIGN_ANGLE configuration for align braking
Override pin and brake / align according to BRAKE_PIN_MODE
Override pin and do not brake / align

bit_field.name: SPEED_MODE
bit_field.description: Configure Speed Ctrl mode from Speed pin

settings.description: Pin 36 as DACOUT1 and Pin 37 as DACOUT2

bit_field.name: INPUT_MAXIMUM_FREQ
bit_field.description: Input frequency on speed pin for speed control mode as "controlled by frequency speed pin input" that corresponds to 100% duty cycle. Input duty cycle = Input frequency / INPUT_MAXIMUM_FREQ

bit_field.name: SLEEP_ENTRY_TIME
bit_field.description: Device enters sleep mode when speed input is held continuously below the speed threshold for SEEP_ENTRY_TIME

settings.description: Sleep Entry when SPEED pin remains low for 50s
Sleep Entry when SPEED pin remains low for 200s
Sleep Entry when SPEED pin remains low for 20ms
Sleep Entry when SPEED pin remains low for 200ms

bit_field.name: DYNAMIC_CSA_GAIN_EN
bit_field.description: Adjust CSA gain at 1ms rate for optimal current resolution at all current levels

bit_field.name: DYNAMIC_VOLTAGE_GAIN_EN
bit_field.description: Adjust voltage gain at 1ms rate for optimal voltage resolution at all voltage levels

settings.description: Override DIR pin with clockwise rotation OUTA-OUTB-OUTC
Override DIR pin with counter clockwise rotation OUTA-OUTC-OUTB

bit_field.name: DIR_CHANGE_MODE
bit_field.description: Response to change of DIR pin status

settings.description: Follow motor stop options and ISD routine on detecting DIR change
Change the direction through Reverse Drive while continuously driving the motor

bit_field.name: SELF_TEST_ENABLE
bit_field.description: Enables self test on power up

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_BRAKE_SPEED_DELTA_LIMIT_ENTRY
bit_field.description: Difference between final speed and present speed below which active braking will be applied

bit_field.name: ACTIVE_BRAKE_MOD_INDEX_LIMIT
bit_field.description: Modulation Index limit beyond which active braking will be applied

bit_field.name: SPEED_RANGE_SEL
bit_field.description: Speed range selection for digital speed (PWM Duty or Frequency to speed mode)

settings.description: SDO IO in Open Drain Mode
SDO IO in Push Pull Mode
No clear fault command is issued
To clear the latched fault bits. This bit automatically resets after being written.

bit_field.name: PWM100_DUTY_SEL
bit_field.description: Freqency of PWM at 100% Duty Cycle

settings.description: SPI fault reporting on nFAULT pin is enabled
SPI fault reporting on nFAULT pin is disabled
Over temperature reporting on nFAULT is disabled
Over temperature reporting on nFAULT is enabled
Enter Low Power Mode Selected by LP_MODE
OCP clearing in PWM input cycle change is disabled
OCP clearing in PWM input cycle change is enabled
Overcurrent causes an automatic retrying fault
Overcurrent is report only but no action is taken
Overcurrent is not reported and no action is taken
Active Demag comparator threshold is 100 mA
Active Demag comparator threshold is 150 mA
Active Demag comparator threshold is 100 mA
Active Demag comparator threshold is 150 mA

bit_field.name: CSA_GAIN
bit_field.description: Current Sense Amplifier's Gain Settings (Used only if DYNAMIC_CSA_GAIN_EN = 0)

bit_field.name: TARGET_DELAY
bit_field.description: Delay Target for Driver Delay Compensation

settings.description: Buck regulator current limit is set to 600 mA
Buck regulator current limit is set to 150 mA
